sentences.en: A world - famous violinist is playing at tonight's concert.
sentences.cn: 一位世界闻名的小提琴家将在今晚的音乐会上演奏.

sentences.en: As the violinist prepared to play, the audience stilled.
sentences.cn: 当小提琴手准备演奏时, 全场静下来.

sentences.en: Everyone cheered for the violinist at our school concert.
sentences.cn: 在学校音乐会上,大家都为小提琴手喝彩叫好.

sentences.en: Guitarist Django Reinhardt and violinist Stephen Grapelli are the most famous gypsy jazz artists and they both happen to play for this quintet.
sentences.cn: 吉他手莱因哈特和小提琴家斯蒂芬·格拉佩利是最著名的吉普赛爵士乐艺术家，他们都曾为法国爱乐五重奏演出。

sentences.en: He dreams of one day becoming a famous violinist.
sentences.cn: 他梦想有朝一日成为着名的小提琴家.

sentences.en: He has acquired a reputation as this country's premier solo violinist.
sentences.cn: 他已经赢得了该国首席小提琴独奏家的名誉。

sentences.en: His mother tagged him along, hurried but the kid stopped to look at the violinist.
sentences.cn: 妈妈拉着他急匆匆地走，但他停下来注视着小提琴家。

sentences.en: Rose's father was a talented violinist.
sentences.cn: 罗斯的父亲是一位天才的小提琴手。

sentences.en: She's a great violinist by any standard.
sentences.cn: 不论以什么标准看,她都是伟大的小提琴家.

sentences.en: Sir Edward Elgar (1857-1934) is known for his choral and orchestral works, some of which have been made more widely known by the famous violinist Yehudi Menuhin.
sentences.cn: 爱德华·艾尔加爵士 (1857-1934)因合唱和管弦乐曲目而知名，其中一些作品因著名的小提琴家耶胡迪·梅纽因而更广为人知。

sentences.en: The audience clapped the violinist heartily.
sentences.cn: 观众热烈地向提琴手鼓掌.

sentences.en: The boxes warmly applauded the famous violinist.
sentences.cn: 包厢内的观众为那位著名的小提琴家热烈鼓掌.
这位小提琴家被听众要求再演奏一曲.

sentences.en: The violinist played his own opus No.16.
sentences.cn: 这位提琴家演奏他自己的第十六号乐曲。

sentences.en: The violinist resumed playing after intermission.
sentences.cn: 幕间休息后,小提琴家继续演奏.

sentences.en: The violinist resumed playing after the intermission.
sentences.cn: 幕间休息之后,那小提琴手又重新开始演奏.

sentences.en: The violinist walked on the stage and the duo became a trio.
sentences.cn: 那位小提琴家走上台,二重奏变成了三重奏组.

sentences.en: The violinist's virtuosity has amazed audiences all over the world .
sentences.cn: 小提琴家的精湛技艺使全世界的观众惊诧不已。

sentences.en: The young girl violinist outshone all the other competitors.
sentences.cn: 那年轻姑娘演奏小提琴使所有的竞争者相形见绌.

trans.tran_cn: 小提琴家，小提琴演奏者
